dict.acceptation: （非特指的）一（个）；（用于表示时间、速度、价格等意义的）每一；（用在某些物质名词和抽象名词前）一阵；（同类事物中的）任何一（个）；

sent.orig: A picture of a cat on a log is a rebus for catalog.
sent.trans: 谜画中有一只猫（cat）站在一块木头（a log）上，谜底是catalog（目录）。

sent.orig: A shipping company has made a claim for the cost of salvaging a sunken ship.
sent.trans: 某轮船公司要求赔赏打捞沉船的费用。（make a claim 要求）

sent.orig: The relatively short [A] of mat and the relatively long [A] of mad are allophones.
sent.trans: 单词 mat 中较短的[A]和单词 mad 中较长的 A是音素的变形。

sent.orig: Draw a line from A to B.
It can take as long as eight days to rig up rope ladders and to establish supply bases before a descent can be made into a very deep cave.
sent.trans: 在进入一个很深的岩洞之前，光是装配绳梯和建立供应基地就需要八天之久。（make a descent 下降）
